snippet.sync_client:
from seed.client import SeedLiteral
client = SeedLiteral(base_url="https://yourhost.com/path/to/api", )
client.headers.send(query="What is the weather today", )
snippet.async_client:
from seed.client import AsyncSeedLiteral
client = AsyncSeedLiteral(base_url="https://yourhost.com/path/to/api", )
await client.headers.send(query="What is the weather today", )

snippet.sync_client:
from seed.client import SeedLiteral
client = SeedLiteral(base_url="https://yourhost.com/path/to/api", )
client.inlined.send(temperature=10.1, query="What is the weather today", )
snippet.async_client:
from seed.client import AsyncSeedLiteral
client = AsyncSeedLiteral(base_url="https://yourhost.com/path/to/api", )
await client.inlined.send(temperature=10.1, query="What is the weather today", )

snippet.sync_client:
from seed.client import SeedLiteral
client = SeedLiteral(base_url="https://yourhost.com/path/to/api", )
client.path.send()
snippet.async_client:
from seed.client import AsyncSeedLiteral
client = AsyncSeedLiteral(base_url="https://yourhost.com/path/to/api", )
await client.path.send()

snippet.sync_client:
from seed.client import SeedLiteral
client = SeedLiteral(base_url="https://yourhost.com/path/to/api", )
client.query.send(query="What is the weather today", )
snippet.async_client:
from seed.client import AsyncSeedLiteral
client = AsyncSeedLiteral(base_url="https://yourhost.com/path/to/api", )
await client.query.send(query="What is the weather today", )

snippet.sync_client:
from seed.client import SeedLiteral
from seed import SendRequest
client = SeedLiteral(base_url="https://yourhost.com/path/to/api", )
client.reference.send(request=SendRequest(prompt="You are a helpful assistant", stream=False, query="What is the weather today", ), )
snippet.async_client:
from seed.client import AsyncSeedLiteral
from seed import SendRequest
client = AsyncSeedLiteral(base_url="https://yourhost.com/path/to/api", )
await client.reference.send(request=SendRequest(prompt="You are a helpful assistant", stream=False, query="What is the weather today", ), )
